content: I've been meaning to explore more books that combine sci-fi and fantasy elements. I recently finished "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo" by Taylor Jenkins Reid, which was a real page-turner. I got the book as a recommendation from my friend Sarah, and I'm so glad I did. Have you got any other recommendations that are more focused on character development and relationships, like "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo"?
